name: Raglin

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in all battles by 33%

skills.name: Repent
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Fills the Turn meter of 3 random allies by 15%. Allies can only have their Turn meter filled once by this Skill.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Mercy
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs on all allies, then heals them. The heal amount is proportional to this Champion's ATK.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Heal +10%

skills.name: Miracle
skills.raw_description:
Revives an ally with 75% HP and a full Turn Meter.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

faction.default_description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 42 champions

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.

seo.description: Raglin is a legendary assist champion from the faction Banner-Lords doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
